I.11. Instructional materials (IMs) are
reviewed and recommended by an
Instructional Materials Committee
(IMC).

Republic of the Philippines CAVITE STATE UNIVERSITY Tanza ǀ Trece Martires City ǀ Gen. Trias City Campus  414-3979 ǀ  (0977)8033809 ǀ  509-4148 www.cvsu.edu.ph
TANZA CAMPUS
OFFICE MEMORANDUM No. OCA – ____ – 20
TO : TO ALL CONCERNED FACULTY MEMBERS
SUBJECT : CREATION OF INSTRUCTIONAL MATERIALS DEVELOPMENT UNIT COMMITTEE
DATE : 26 FEBRUARY 2020
1. One of the core functions of the faculty members is to perform activities and developed instructional materials for the enhancement of the curriculum such as preparation of modules, manuals, instructional materials and the like.
2. In this regard, the following are hereby designated as Instructional Materials Development Unit (IMDU) committee members to facilitate the screening and reviewing materials developed by the faculty members.
Prof. Noel A. Sedigo – Chairperson Prof. Mildred A. Sebastian – Vice Chairperson Ms. Joyce Erika S. Senaris – Member Mr. Ritch M. Banate – Member Mr. Mark Joel C. Sibulo – Member
3. These designations are in addition to your usual duties and responsibilities and do not entail additional compensation.
4. Please be guided accordingly.
5. Thank you.
NOEL A. SEDIGO, MSc Campus Administrator
